epd_metadata.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)

epd_owner.name: Evan Smith
epd_owner.address: Level 40, Northpoint Tower, 100 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia

epd_produced_by.address: Level 3, Greenhouse, 180 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000 Australia

epd_process_certified_by.address: Suite 2600, 101 Marietta St NW, Atlanta, Georgia 30303, USA

product_description.product_use: General use concrete (e.g. foot path, slabs, foundations, normal class)
product_description.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)
product_description.packaging: Delivered in bulk with no packaging
product_description.hazardous_substances: None of the products contain substances listed in the Candidate List of Substances of Very High Concern exceeding 0.1% by weight
product_description.classification: Non-Dangerous Goods according to the Australian Code for the Transport of Dangerous Goods by Road and Rail

lca_information.scope: Cradle to gate (modules A1-A3) with options (modules A4-A5), modules C1-C4 and module D
lca_information.reference_service_life: Not specified (scope is cradle to delivery)

background_data_preferences: Product specific EPDs for cements, admixtures, pigments and fibres
Australian National Life Cycle Inventory Database (AusLCI v1.42) (2023)

allocation.method: Physical allocation based on weight or m³ of concrete; economic allocation used when physical allocation not possible

excluded: Environmental impact from infrastructure, construction, production equipment, and tools not directly consumed
Personnel-related impacts such as transportation to/from work
cut_off_criteria.included: All materials required for manufacturing delivered without packaging except packaging of materials

data_quality.assessment: Good or very good geographic and temporal representativeness
data_quality.background_data_timeliness: All data updated within 10 years as required by PCR 2019:14

transport.average_transport_distance: 14.52 km from manufacturing gate to site

installation.assumptions: Based on industrial expertise and GCCA tool
installation.activities: Pouring concrete from truck and pump, manual finishing; excludes pre-installation activities

end_of_life.control: No control by Holcim over end-of-life fate

deconstruction.process: Physical drilling and removal using hydraulic excavator

processing.recycled_material: Concrete recycled into aggregate replacing virgin coarse aggregate

targets.2030: Embodied carbon of all construction materials to be at least 40% lower
targets.2050: All new construction materials to be net zero

carbonation.description: Natural process of CO2 absorption by concrete over its lifetime
carbonation.note: Not considered in this EPD and not reflected in results

allocation_method.fly_ash: Treated as waste material, only transport impacts included
allocation_method.ground_granulated_blast_furnace_slag: Economic allocation due to significant economic value
allocation_method.silica_fume: Treated as waste material, only transport impacts included

recycled_materials_handling.database_used: AusLCI and ecoinvent datasets conforming to EN 15804

references: Australian Life Cycle Inventory Database Initiative Guidelines (2023)
British Standards Institution BS EN 15804:2012+A2:2019 and BS EN 16757:2017
Department of Climate Change, Energy, the Environment and Water National Waste Report 2022
EPD International General Programme Instructions V4.0 and PCR2019:14 V1.3.4
Man Yu et al., Procedia Engineering, 2017
disclaimers: Environmental impact indicators with high uncertainty or limited experience should be used with care
Ionising radiation indicator excludes effects from nuclear accidents, occupational exposure, and radioactive waste disposal
GWP-GHG (IPCC AR5) excludes biogenic carbon and indirect radiative forcing

Holcim_Australia.address: Level 40/100 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia
